badge_template_activities.title: Organizations are struggling to achieve excellence through people's performance. There are different performance management tools. The majority of these tools are only focused on measurement, subjective evaluation. However, KPI tool is one of the best in class to assess performance numerically and to align Organization-Department-Individual. This credential is proof of delegate's expertise on KPI design, implement, measure, analyze & maintain.
